samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The example demonstrates the default rendering of the Vue Predifined dialog

samples.name: Customization
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to create custom predefined dialogs such as alert, confirmation, and prompt dialog using the Vue predefined dialog component.

samples.name: Animation
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to open or close the Vue Predefined dialog with various animation effects, and how to customize the animation duration and delay.
